ai-patthana20.8:0.2_0: the immediately Factors of the Dhamma
ai-patthana20.8:1.1_0: not seeing the teaching with vision you should give up.
ai-patthana20.8:2.1_0: One should not give up seeing things that shouldn’t be given up by seeing, and by seeing causes and conditions.
ai-patthana20.8:2.1_1: One should not give up without seeing the cause, by seeing the reason for not recognizing an offense.
ai-patthana20.8:2.1_2: Not seeing the Teaching, nor should be given up by seeing, and by seeing, and by seeing three things that arise because of not seeing, and for these three things are to be given up.
